title: Hong Kong court convicts Jimmy Lai and other pro-democracy activists over 2019 protest
content:
1. Hong Kong court convicts Jimmy Lai and other pro-democracy activists over 2019 protest  CNN
  2. Hong Kong court finds veteran pro-democracy activists, most over 60, guilty of unauthorized assembly  The Washington Post
  3. Senior Hong Kong democrats found guilty in landmark unlawful assembly case  Reuters
  4. Hong Kong Court Finds Jimmy Lai, Martin Lee Guilty Over 2019 Protest  Bloomberg Politics
  5. Hong Kong court finds leading democracy activists guilty of unauthorised assembly  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
